description: This graph represents the core functionality of a system that processes user queries, generates responses using a language model, and potentially interacts with external tools. The main flow involves receiving a query, parsing it, generating a response, and then presenting it to the user. Its purpose is to provide an intelligent conversational interface.

components.name: QueryProcessor
components.description: Handles incoming user queries, including parsing and initial validation.

components.name: LanguageModel
components.description: Generates responses based on processed queries using a large language model.

components.name: ToolExecutor
components.description: Executes external tools or APIs as directed by the language model.

components.name: ResponseFormatter
components.description: Formats the generated response for presentation to the user.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
